thread.section_title: eSURRANTY.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eSURRANTY.com | esurranty.com
thread.title: Dan McHugh

author: Dan McHugh
title: Dan McHugh
text: I've paid for the policy, the deductible, and the refundable deposit for the loaner phone. As soon as they had my money, they went COMPLETELY GHOST!!!. Nobody emails me back. Nobody picks up the phone. The Live Chat is ALWAYS offline. There is simply NO WAY to get in touch with anyone. They have had my money for WEEKS and have provided NO SERVICE WHATSOEVER. I have not even received the loaner phone - let alone the repair/replacement of my phone. You can't even reference a single policy number - they give you separate numbers for the policy, the claim, and seemingly any action they take on your part, which makes tracking this a nightmare as well. TERRIBLE company.
